properties.description: Financial services SaaS provider specializing in expense and spend management; headquartered in UAE with 62 employees, $1M revenue, and $19M funding, including a seed round in November 2024; offers corporate cards, expense automation, and invoice payment for MENA businesses.

# Cards that automate expenses for UAE businesses

Smart corporate cards, receipt collection, AI-powered accounting, and more. All in one place. For businesses of all sizes.

[Get started](https://www.pemo.io/www.pemo.io#trusted-by) [Book a demo](https://www.pemo.io/www.pemo.io#book-a-demo)

Trusted by 10000+ companies

## Get started

- Get unlimited corporate cards.

- Control business expenses in real-time.


Get up to 2 free company cards

Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.

## How Pemo works

### Pay with your Pemo card

Make purchases effortlessly using your Pemo physical or virtual card ‚Äî for every business expense.

### Attach your receipt

Snap and submit receipts instantly after every spend, keeping all records organized and accessible.

### Track in real-time

Monitor every transaction as it happens, giving you and your team instant insights into spending and budget status.

### Automate your accounting

Pemo integrates with your accounting software for easy categorization and real-time sync of transactions.

Pay with your Pemo card

## Book your free demo

Let us know your priorities and how you currently manage company spending.Get an overview of the product and walkthrough of the key features.

## Smarter spending starts here

Eliminate petty cash

Say goodbye to petty cash handling with Pemo‚Äôs corporate cards. Enjoy full, instant control over spending.

Skip expense reports

Automate expense management with AI-powered receipt matching and real-time expense tracking.

Control your business spend

Set spending limits, customize approval workflows, and monitor spend in real-time with advanced insights.

Close books 5X faster

Automate accounting with seamless software integration, AI auto-categorization, and instant reconciliation.

Keep spend secure

Freeze or unfreeze cards instantly, control spending by category or location, and stay secure with advanced fraud protection.

Save on every transaction

Earn cashback and rewards on business transactions‚Äîmaking smarter spending both efficient and profitable.

## Seamless accounting integrations

Automate your accounting with direct integrations, easy-categorization, and real-time sync for every transaction.

[Learn more about accounting integrations](https://www.pemo.io/accounting-automation)

[Learn more about accounting integrations](https://www.pemo.io/accounting-automation)

## Empowering businesses, delivering results

### Everything you need to efficiently manage business spend

### Smart Corporate Cards

Simplify spending with Pemo‚Äôs physical and virtual cards. Take charge with advanced controls to set spending limits, restrict by merchant category, or manage by location.

Powered by Mastercard, Pemo cards are accepted everywhere‚Äîonline, in-store, and with Apple Pay or Google Pay.

[Learn more about Pemo cards](https://www.pemo.io/corporate-cards)

### Real-time expense management

Experience total transparency and effortless control over every transaction.

With automatic receipt matching, Pemo streamlines expense reporting‚Äîsaving your team hundreds of hours each month.

[Explore real-time expense management](https://www.pemo.io/expense-management)

### AI-powered accounting automation

Enjoy instant AI-powered expense categorization that syncs directly with your accounting system.

Save hours and eliminate manual effort and errors.

[Discover AI-powered automation](https://www.pemo.io/accounting-automation)

### Smart Corporate Cards

Simplify spending with Pemo‚Äôs physical and virtual cards. Take charge with advanced controls to set spending limits, restrict by merchant category, or manage by location.

Powered by Mastercard, Pemo cards are accepted everywhere‚Äîonline, in-store, and with Apple Pay or Google Pay.

[Learn more about Pemo cards](https://www.pemo.io/corporate-cards)

### Real-time expense management

Experience total transparency and effortless control over every transaction.

With automatic receipt matching, Pemo streamlines expense reporting‚Äîsaving your team hundreds of hours each month.

[Explore real-time expense management](https://www.pemo.io/expense-management)

### AI-powered accounting automation

Enjoy instant AI-powered expense categorization that syncs directly with your accounting system.

Save hours and eliminate manual effort and errors.

[Discover AI-powered automation](https://www.pemo.io/accounting-automation)

## Substantial cashback and exclusive rewards with every spend

Cashback

Earn up to 2% cashback on business transactions. Turn everyday spending into extra funds for your business.

Travel

Unlock value on every trip with up to 15% off on hotels and complimentary lounge access at top airports worldwide.

Software subscriptions

Access exclusive rates on over 100 essential business platforms, including Google Ads, Meta, Notion, Microsoft, and more.

[Explore all the benefits with Pemo](https://www.pemo.io/card-benefits)

## Real success, real stories

See how businesses like yours are achieving more with Pemo‚Äîtrusted results, lasting impact.

[Hear more from our customers](https://www.pemo.io/customer-reviews)

What an ease to manage our petty cash daily expenses with PEMO. We are totally in love with this app. Our daily paperwork, tracking and WhatsApp photos of bills is all sorted by PEMO. I will recommend this amazing app for all business.

Blessila Vas

Finance Controller, Parklane

Financial Services

If it weren't for Pemo I would've been drowned in cash-counting and reconciliations, instead of making key decisions.

**Nas Furqan**

CFO, Licena Group

Oil & Gas company, 10-50 employees

To be honest using Pemo is amazing it had eased our daily purchases so much. And noting that the system is also easy to use, which makes it a plus for Pemo.

**Kareem Saadieh**

Business Analyst, APPRO AE

Financial Services, 10-50 employees

The team utilizes Pemo for various financial operations. They find the entire process, from applying for an account to receiving the card and conducting online transactions, to be smooth and easy. Pemo is crucial in facilitating the company's financial activities, making them an integral part of its operations.

**Anas Tayyab**

Manger Finance and Account, Salvone Technology Solutions DMCC

IT, 10-50 Employees

It‚Äôs been almost two months since our finance team introduced Pemo, and everything is working well on my end. It is a super user-friendly app, we like it a lot!

**Sheena Aranzanzo**

Admin, The Warrior Group

Events , 10-50 Employees

Best Team and Best app ever.

HR Manager, LaLaBix

E-Commerce, 10-50 Employees

Using Pemo is hassel free.

Director, Fractal Systems

Excellent way to track petty cash.

Location Manager, Kelvin Catering Services (EMIRATES) LLC

Hospitality, 200+ Employees

Perfect fintech solution for SMEs.

E-commerce, 1-50 employees

Reports can be easily generated. Also, there are options to create a report as per our needs.

## Have questions?

What is Pemo?

Pemo is an innovative [expense management](https://www.pemo.io/expense-management) platform built for small and medium-sized businesses in the MENA region. We provide a user-friendly solution to automate expense tracking, streamline approvals, and improve financial transparency‚Äîall while saving you time and effort. Think of Pemo as your partner in simplifying business finances.

Who is Pemo for?

Pemo is designed for SMEs, startups, and growing businesses looking to take control of their expenses. Whether you‚Äôre managing a team or running a business on your own, Pemo helps you reduce manual processes, eliminate errors, and stay on top of your financial game effortlessly.

What makes Pemo different from traditional expense management methods?

At Pemo, we automate and simplify expense management. Say goodbye to spreadsheets, petty cash, and manual entry errors! Our platform gives you real-time visibility and streamlined tracking all in one place‚Äîno more juggling multiple systems. Pemo empowers you to save time, reduce errors, and get a clear picture of your finances in seconds.

Can Pemo integrate with my existing accounting software?

Yes, Pemo is designed to work seamlessly with popular [accounting systems](https://www.pemo.io/accounting-automation), allowing for smooth data flow and easy syncing of expenses. This means you can continue using your current software while enjoying all the benefits of automated, real-time expense tracking through Pemo.

Is Pemo secure? How do you protect my business‚Äôs financial data?

[Security](https://www.pemo.io/security) is a top priority at Pemo. We use advanced encryption and multi-factor authentication to safeguard your data. Our platform is compliant with the highest industry standards, ensuring that your financial information is secure and accessible only to authorized users.

How much time can I save by switching to Pemo?

On average, Pemo users save hours each week by reducing manual data entry and paperwork. With automated expense tracking, easy approvals, and a user-friendly interface, you can focus on growing your business while we handle the admin. Most businesses see a 20% time savings within the first month.

## See the difference Pemo can make

Join thousands of businesses saving time and money.

[Get started](https://www.pemo.io/app-sign-up) [Book a demo](https://www.pemo.io/book-a-demo)

company.about:
The smartest company cards that automate expenses for MENA businesses.
We help businesses grow with our all-in-one spend management platform that includes corporate cards, expense management, accounting automation, invoice payment and more.

evaluations.criterion: Company provides SaaS (Software as a Service) products or services AND is headquartered in UAE or Qatar AND has between 51 and 200 employees AND has annual revenue greater than $1,000
evaluations.reasoning: Pemo is headquartered in the United Arab Emirates, has 62 employees (within the 51‚Äë200 range), reports annual revenue of USD‚ÄØ1,000,000 (greater than $1,000), and offers an all‚Äëin‚Äëone spend‚Äëmanagement platform‚Äîi.e., a SaaS product for corporate cards, expense management, accounting automation, and invoice payment. All four criteria are met.

properties.description: Financial services company specializing in SaaS-based digital payment solutions; 54 employees (+53.7% YoY growth), $9M annual revenue, $31.6M total funding, founded 2020 in UAE, licensed by the Central Bank of the UAE. Offers cloud-based checkout and payment gateway services, serving the Middle East market, with a global rank of #199,718 and 216,600 monthly website visits.

# Move your money¬†forward

For businesses and individuals ‚Äì the fast and secure way to send and receive money in the UAE

[Get started for free](https://ziina.com/app-link/DownloadApp)

[Licensed by the\
Central Bank of the UAE](https://www.centralbank.ae/en/licensing/)

Whether you‚Äôre building your business or splitting the bill with friends, Ziina helps move your money forward. We‚Äôre on a mission to bring financial freedom to every person in the Middle East. Because access isn‚Äôt a privilege ‚Äî it‚Äôs a right.

## Your iPhone is now your Ziina Card.

Apple Pay is an easy, secure, and private way to use your Ziina card on all your Apple devices.

[Learn more](https://ziina.com/card/apple-pay)

evaluations.reasoning: Ziina‚Äôs internal profile lists 54 employees, placing it between 51 and 200 staff. The company is headquartered in the United Arab Emirates, meeting the UAE/Qatar location requirement. Annual revenue is reported at $9‚ÄØmillion, far above the $1,000 threshold. The website‚Äôs payment‚Äëgateway page describes a cloud‚Äëbased checkout and integration service (SaaS) that businesses can sign up for and use directly on their sites, confirming that Ziina offers SaaS products. All four criteria are satisfied.

references.title: Ziina - Wikipedia
references.snippet:
Is Ziina considered a bank?
Ziina is a private fintech company based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates, founded in 2020. It offers digital payments services for consumers and businesses, including peer-to-peer transfers, payment links, QR and NFC (Tap to Pay) acceptance, and a payment gateway for SMEs.

properties.description: Qashio is a UAE-based private financial services SaaS company with 81 employees and $15 million in annual revenue, founded in 2021. It provides a comprehensive spend management platform with corporate cards, expense automation, and finance solutions for MENA businesses; received $14 million in Series A funding in 2024, and has won awards including Gulf Capital Fintech of the Year 2022 and Entrepreneur E-Payment Solution of the Year 2023.
properties.content:

English

# The Most Complete Spend Management Solution for High Performing Companies

Control spend, Automate manual work, and get Rewarded with the World‚Äôs Smartest Corporate Cards

[Get Started For Free](https://join.qashio.com) [See Qashio in Action](https://www.qashio.com/www.qashio.com)

10

k+

Users

23

Live countries

1

b+

Transactions

1

m+

Skywards miles redeemed

## The card is just the start

Giving Businesses full control and visibility on all Expense and Payables Operations in a Powerful Financial Control Centre

[**Unlimited Smart Corporate Cards** \
Create as many cards as you need in seconds - with advanced controls and limits.](https://www.qashio.com/features/unlimited-corporate-cards)

[**Wallets & Pool Accounts** \
Create customised wallets. Control budgets and manage client payables.](https://www.qashio.com/features/pool-accounts)

[**Automate Petty Cash** \
Reduce petty cash spend by over 90% by eliminating all manual cash processes, minimise leakages and drive efficiencies proactively](https://www.qashio.com/features/spend-controls-and-limits)

[**Seamless ERP Integration** \
\
Integrates with to ERPs Dynamics365, Oracle Netsuite, SAP, ¬†Xero, Zoho and more to streamline your financial operations.](https://www.qashio.com/features/erp-integrations) [**AI Receipt Tracking** \
Automatically match receipts to transactions to simplify record-keeping using WhatsApp.](https://www.qashio.com/features/ai-based-receipt-matching) [**Exclusive Rewards** \
Earn Qashio Points on every transaction and exchange them for Emirates Skywards Miles, Shukrans or Cashback.](https://www.qashio.com/features/qashio-rewards-loyalty-system)

[**Unlimited Smart Corporate Cards** \
Create as many cards as you need in seconds - with advanced controls and limits.](https://www.qashio.com/features/unlimited-corporate-cards)

[**Wallets & Pool Accounts** \
Create customised wallets with controls by yourself, to control budgets and manage client payables.](https://www.qashio.com/features/pool-accounts)

[**Automate Petty Cash** \
Reduce petty cash spend by over 30% by eliminating all manual cash processes, minimise leakages and drive efficiencies proactively.](https://www.qashio.com/features/spend-controls-and-limits)

[**Seamless ERP integration** \
\
Integrates with to¬† ERPs Dynamics365, Oracle Netsuite, SAP,¬† Xero, Zoho and more to streamline your financial operations.](https://www.qashio.com/features/erp-integrations)

[**AI Receipt Tracking** \
Automatically match receipts to transactions to simplify record-keeping using WhatsApp.](https://www.qashio.com/features/ai-based-receipt-matching)

[**Exclusive Rewards** \
Earn Qashio Points for every dollar spent and exchange them for Emirates Skywards Miles, Shukrans or Cashback.](https://www.qashio.com/features/qashio-rewards-loyalty-system)

## Rewards you actually want

UNLOCK YOUR REWARDS

### Qashio Points

Maximise the value of your business spending with Qashio Points.

Maximise the value of your business spending with Qashio Points.Earn up to 2 points for every dollar spent using our corporate cards, and redeem these points for exclusive benefits like Emirates Skywards Miles, Shukrans, Cashback and more.

[Discover Qashio Points](https://www.qashio.com/product/points)

[**Emirates Skywards** \
Unlock the world with Emirates Skywards exclusive partnership. Convert your Qashio Points into Skywards Miles and use them for flights, hotel stays, and flight upgrades with Emirates.](https://www.qashio.com/qashio-rewards/emirates-skywards) [**Cashback** \
Boost your company‚Äôs savings with Cashback. Redeem your Qashio Points for cashback to offset future expenses and enhance your company‚Äôs budget.](https://www.qashio.com/qashio-rewards/cashback) [**Shukran** \
Convert your Qashio Points into Shukrans to purchase a variety of goods and services for your company, including office supplies, equipment, and more.](https://www.qashio.com/qashio-rewards/shukran)

## Our Products

### Qashio Spend Management

Corporate Expense Management Solution that allows business to instantly create smart corporate cards with advance controls and real time visibility

[Learn More](https://www.qashio.com/product/expense-management)

### Qashio Points

The only corporate card enabling businesses to earn Qashio Points and convert them to Emirates Skywards Miles, Shukrans and Cashback.

[Learn More](https://www.qashio.com/product/points)

### Qashio Corporate Credit

Provides companies with quick financing through a direct lending licence and a strategic partnership with more than five lending partners

[Learn More](https://www.qashio.com/product/financing)

### Qashio Accounts

Streamlines accounts payables. Manage payments, improve cash flow, and strengthen vendor relationships.

[Learn More](https://www.qashio.com/contact-us)

### Qashio Insurance

A fully digitised business insurance solution offering best-in-market rates on health and commercial insurance in minutes.

[Learn More](https://www.qashio.com/product/insurance)

### Rewards & Offers

Explore over 100 discount partners including Google Ads, Meta, AWS, Booking.com, Agoda and Microsoft 365.

[Learn More](https://www.qashio.com/qashio-rewards)

[**Retail and E-commerce** \

Here‚Äôs How it Works

## Elevate your corporate spend in 6 easy steps

1.

Onboard in minutes and create your smart corporate cards instantly

2

Issue unlimited smart corporate cards for your team

3.

Connect your cards to Apple Pay, Samsung Pay and Google Pay

4.

Convert your Qashio Points into Emirates Skywards Miles, Shukrans or Cashback

6.

[Open an Account Now](https://join.qashio.com/)

## Success Stories

Before Qashio, we struggled with manual expense tracking, time-consuming reconciliations, and inefficient communication with employees. Qashio has streamlined these processes, providing a centralized platform for all expense-related activities.

### Puja Lakhotia

Finance Director

The mobility that we experience with Qashio cards really saves us time when there are urgent and important purchases from any of the restaurants or office departments.

### Saqib Malik

Finance Manager

We've been working with Qashio for nearly a year, and it's made a significant difference in how we manage our petty cash and streamline our accounting processes.

### Levi McGrattan

Chief Operating Officer

Before Qashio, we struggled with manual expense tracking, time-consuming reconciliations, and inefficient communication with employees. Qashio has streamlined these processes, providing a centralized platform for all expense-related activities.

### FITT Meals

Chief Operating Officer

Made in UAE, Safe in UAE

Be the one to elevate your business and set the standard for success.

With the customer at heart, all our team members are based in UAE to deliver on our promise of highest global and local standards (NESA, ISO 22301, ISO 27001), first class security and local expertise. We host all our data; fast, secure and always available in UAE.

company.name: Qashio
company.about:
Qashio is a comprehensive spend management platform for businesses to manage expenses, payments with integrated corporate cards and accounts payable automation.

Gulf Capital Fintech of the Year 2022
Entrepreneur E-Payment Solution of the Year 2023

Qashio integrates real-time tracking for every business expense, automates accounting and provides real-time reporting to give better visibility and true control over all spend so that you can make informed cash flow decisions. With Qashio you can build strategic budgets and automate expense reporting.

evaluations.criterion: Company provides SaaS (Software as a Service) products or services AND is headquartered in UAE or Qatar AND has between 51 and 200 employees AND has annual revenue greater than $1,000
evaluations.reasoning: Qashio‚Äôs internal profile lists 81 employees, which falls within the 51‚Äë200 range, and an annual revenue of $15‚ÄØmillion, well above $1,000. The company is headquartered in the United Arab Emirates, satisfying the UAE/Qatar location requirement. The profile describes Qashio as a ‚Äúcomprehensive spend management platform‚Äù and ‚Äúexpense management solution‚Äù that offers corporate cards, finance, and tax automation ‚Äì a cloud‚Äëbased SaaS offering. External search results confirm the SaaS nature, noting Qashio as a ‚ÄúB2B financial management platform‚Äù with customizable SaaS tools (Hub71). All four criteria are met.
